parameter.name: input_field_initial_latitude
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Latitude of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_longitude
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Longitude of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_latitude_step
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Distance between two latitude points in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_longitude_step
parameter.documentation: used in a geographical projection context: Distance between two longitude points in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_y
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_x
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_y
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_x
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_y_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_x_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_final_y_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_initial_x_date
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-coordinate of the point (1,1) in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_y_step
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: y-step in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_x_step
parameter.documentation: used in a cartesian projection context: x-step in the input array

parameter.name: input_field_primary_index
parameter.documentation: Primary or first index of input array(LATITUDE/LONGITUDE)

parameter.name: input_field_gradient_control
parameter.documentation: How to calculate the contour gradients(LEAST/FLAT_ONLY/OFF)

parameter.name: input_field_gradient_limitation
parameter.documentation: Set gradient to 0 for minimum and/or maximum values(MINIMUM/MAXIMUM/BOTH/OFF)
